name: REDWIRE SPACE
sampleDescriptions: Discussing with NASA the potential benefits of partnering with Redwire Space.
Provided tour and briefing to Bill Nelson on Redwire Space 3D printing technology.  Contacted Rep. Crist and Rep. Lawson to support funding for NASA's OSAM 2 Program.
Communicated with Rep Charlie Crist, Rep Al Lawson, congressional office staff and NASA senior staff re Aerospace issues.

Communicated with Rep Charlie Crist, Rep Al Lawson, Rep Kathy Castor, Rep Debbie Wasserman Schulz, NASA Administrator Bill Nelson as well as NASA senior staff re funding for Archinault & OSAM II progr

Communicated with Rep Charlie Crist, Rep Al Lawson, Rep Kathy Castor, Rep Debbie Wasserman Schulz, NASA Administrator Bill Nelson as well as NASA senior staff re funding for Archinault & OSAM II progr
